text: Unn kay rasoolon ney unhen kaha kay kiya haq taalaa kay baray mein tumhen shak hai jo aasmano aur zamin ka bananey wala hai woh to tumhen iss liye bula raha hai kay tumharay tamam gunah moaf farma dey aur aik muqarrara waqt tak tumhen mohlat ata farmaye unhon ney kaha kay tum to hum jaisay hi insan ho tum chahatay ho kay humen unn khudaon ki ibadat say rok do jin ki ibadat humaray baap dada kertay rahey acha to humaray samney koi khulli daleel paish kero
